From: "Jason Rogers" <jason.rogers@...>

    > I noticed the solution you posted and wanted to know if 
    > it's possible to
    > setup instance variables which  would be
    > accessable by all TestCases?
    > Should I rather be creating a super class and then extend 
    > this superclass
    > with all my testCases?

Yes.  If there are instance variables that certain test cases need in
common, it would be good to write a super class that extends TestCase and
then have your individual test cases extend that new test case.

-Jason
subject: RE: FW: RE: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test su ite
